plot: Twenty years after saving a frail sapling from a cutting crew, Molly Logan learns that the bank is foreclosing on her parents' Christmas tree farm.  Can the tree she spared rescue the holiday?
title: The Tree That Saved Christmas
plot_es: Twenty years after saving a frail sapling from a cutting crew, Molly Logan learns that the bank is foreclosing on her parents' Christmas tree farm.  Can the tree she spared rescue the holiday?
plot_en: Twenty years after saving a frail sapling from a cutting crew, Molly Logan learns that the bank is foreclosing on her parents' Christmas tree farm.  Can the tree she spared rescue the holiday?
